arabicText: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	evils	of	their	deeds	appeared	to	
them,	and	the	punishment	they	used	to	
mock	at	encompassed	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	par	khul	gayiñ	un	ke	kāmoñ	ki	
burāiyāñ	aur	unheñ	gher	liyā	us	'aƶāb	ne	jis	
ki	hañsi	banāte	they.

arabicText: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	evils	of	their	deeds	appeared	to	
them,	and	the	punishment	they	used	to	
mock	at	encompassed	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	par	khul	gayiñ	un	ke	kāmoñ	ki	
burāiyāñ	aur	unheñ	gher	liyā	us	'aƶāb	ne	jis	
ki	hañsi	banāte	they.

arabicText: وَقِيلَ ٱلْيَوْمَ نَنسَىٰكُمْ كَمَا نَسِيتُمْ لِقَآءَ يَوْمِكُمْ هَـٰذَا وَمَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	will	be	said,	“This	day	We	shall	
forsake	you,	the	way	you	had	forgotten	the	
confronting	of	this	day	of	yours	-	and	your	
destination	is	the	fire,	and	you	do	not	have	
any	supporters.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	farmāyā	jāye	gā	āaj	ham	tumheñ	chord	
deñ	ge	jaise	tum	apne	is	din	ke	milne	ko	
bhoole	huye	they	aur	tumhārā	thikānā	āag	
hai	aur	tumhārā	koyi	madadgār	nahiñ

arabicText: ذَٰلِكُم بِأَنَّكُمُ ٱتَّخَذْتُمْ ءَايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ هُزُوًۭا وَغَرَّتْكُمُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۚ فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يُخْرَجُونَ مِنْهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُسْتَعْتَبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“This	is	because	you	mocked	at	the	signs	of	
Allah,	and	the	worldly	life	deceived	you”;	
so	this	day	they	are	not	to	be	removed	
from	the	fire,	nor	will	anyone	seek	amends	
from	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	tum	ne	Allāh	ki	āayatoñ	kā	
thathā	(mazāq)	banāyā	aur	duniyā	ki	
zindagi	ne	tumheñ	fareb	diyā	to	āaj	na	woh	
āag	se	nikāle	jāyeñ	aur	na	un	se	koyi	
manānā	chāhe

arabicText: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلْحَمْدُ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَرَبِّ ٱلْأَرْضِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	all	praise	is	for	Allah	only,	the	Lord	of	
the	heavens	and	the	Lord	of	the	earth,	the	
Lord	of	the	Creation!
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	Allāh	hi	ke	liye	sab	khoobiyāñ	haiñ	
āasmānoñ	kā	rab	aur	zameen	kā	Rab	aur	
sāre	jahān	kā	Rab.

arabicText: وَلَهُ ٱلْكِبْرِيَآءُ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	Him	only	is	the	Greatness,	in	the	
heavens	and	in	the	earth;	and	He	only	is	
the	Most	Honourable,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	usi	ke	liye	badāyi	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	
zamin	meiñ	aur	wohi		Ízzat-o-Hikmat	wālā	
hai.

arabicText: حمٓ
englishTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.(*Alphabets of the Arabic 
language; Allah and to whomever He 
reveals, know their precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.(*	Arabi	zabān	ke	huroof	jin	ke	
ma’āni	Allah	aur	jis	par	Allah	ne	inko	nazil	
farmaya	Wahi	jānta	hai.)

arabicText: تَنزِيلُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
The	sending	down	of	this	Book	is	from	
Allah	the	Most	Honourable,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	Kitāb	utārna	hai	Allah	‘Izzat-o-Hikmat	
wāle	ki	taraf	se.

arabicText: مَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَأَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ عَمَّآ أُنذِرُوا۟ مُعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
We	did	not	create	the	heavens	and	the	earth	and	all	that	is	between	them	except	with	the	truth,	
and	for	a	fixed	term;	and	the	disbelievers	have	turned	away	from	what	they	are	warned!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum	ne	na	banaye	āasmān	aur	zameen	aur	jo	kuchh	inke darmiyān	hai	magar	haq	ke	sāth	aur	ek	
muqarrar	mee'ād	par	aur	kāfir	us	cheez	se	ke	daraye	gaye	moñh	phere	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُم مَّا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ لَهُمْ شِرْكٌۭ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ۖ ٱئْتُونِى بِكِتَـٰبٍۢ مِّن قَبْلِ هَـٰذَآ أَوْ أَثَـٰرَةٍۢ مِّنْ عِلْمٍ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“What	is	your	opinion	-	regarding	those	whom	you	worship	other	than	Allah	-	show	me	which	part	of	the	earth	they	
have	created,	or	do	they	own	any	portion	of	the	heavens?	Bring	to	me	a	Book	preceding	this	
(Qur’an),	or	some	remnants	of	knowledge,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		bhala	batāo	to	woh	jo	tum	Allah	ke	siwa	poojte	ho	mujhe	dikhāo	unhoñ	ne	zameen	
ka	kaun	sa	zarra	banāya	ya	āasmān	meiñ	unka	koi	hissa	hai	mere	pās	lāo	is	se	pehli	koi	Kitāb	ya	
kuch	bachā	khucha	‘Ilm	agar	tum	sachche	ho

arabicText: وَمَنْ أَضَلُّ مِمَّن يَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَن لَّا يَسْتَجِيبُ لَهُۥٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَهُمْ عَن دُعَآئِهِمْ غَـٰفِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	who	is	more	astray	than	one	who	worships	those,	instead	of	Allah,	who	cannot	listen	to	their	
prayer	until*	the	Day	of	Resurrection,	and	who	do	not	even	know	of	their	worship!	(Will	never	
listen.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	se	badh	kar	gumrah	kaun	jo	Allah	ke	siwa	aisoñ	ko	pooje	jo	Qiyamat	tak	uski	na	suneiñ	
aur	unheiñ	unki	pooja	ki	khabar	tak	nahi

arabicText: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ ٱلنَّاسُ كَانُوا۟ لَهُمْ أَعْدَآءًۭ وَكَانُوا۟ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ كَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	on	the	day	when	people	are	gathered,	
they	will	become	their	enemies,	and	will	
reject	their	worshippers.	(The	idols	will	
give	testimony	against	the	polytheists.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	logoñ	ka	hashr	hoga	woh	unke	
dushman	hoñge	aur	un	se	munkir	ho	jāyeñ	
ge

arabicText: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍۢ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌۭ مُّبِينٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	Our	clear	verses	are	recited	to	
them,	the	disbelievers	say	regarding	the	
Truth	that	has	come	to	them,	“This	is	an	
obvious	magic!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	un	par	padhi	jāyeñ	hamāri	raushan	
āayateiñ	to	kāfir	apne	pās	āaye	huwe	haq	ko	
kehte	haiñ	yeh	khula	jādu	hai

arabicText: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ ۖ قُلْ إِنِ ٱفْتَرَيْتُهُۥ فَلَا تَمْلِكُونَ لِى مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا ۖ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِ ۖ كَفَىٰ بِهِۦ شَهِيدًۢا بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
What!	They	dare	say,	“He	has	fabricated	
it”?	Say	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“If	I	have	
fabricated	it,	then	(I	know	that)	you	have	
no	power	to	support	me	against	Allah;	He	
well	knows	the	matters	you	are	involved	
in;	He	is	Sufficient	as	a	Witness	between	
me	and	you;	and	He	only	is	the	Oft	
Forgiving,	the	Most	Merciful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	kehte	haiñ,	inhoñ	ne	ise	ji	se	banāya	tum	
farmāo		agar	maiñ	ne	ise	ji	se	banā	liya	hoga	
to	tum	Allah	ke	sāmne	mera	kuchh	ikhtiyār	
nahi	rakhte	woh	khoob	jānta	hai	jin	bātoñ	
meiñ	tum	mashghool	ho	aur	woh	kāfi	hai	
mere	aur	tumhāre	darmiyān	gawah	aur	
wohi	bakhsh ne	wāla	maherbān	hai

arabicText: قُلْ مَا كُنتُ بِدْعًۭا مِّنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَمَآ أَدْرِى مَا يُفْعَلُ بِى وَلَا بِكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌۭ مُّبِينٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“I	am	not	something	new*	among	the	
Noble	Messengers,	nor	do	I	know	(on	my	
own)	what	will	happen	to	me**	or	with	
you;	I	only	follow	that	which	is	divinely	
revealed	to	me,	and	I	am	purely	a	Herald	of	
clear	warning.	(*	I	am	like	the	earlier	ones.	
**	My	knowledge	comes	due	to	divine	
revelations.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	maiñ	koi	anokha	Rasool	nahi	
aur	maiñ	nahi	jānta	mere	sāth	kya	kiya	
jāyega	aur	tumhāre	sāth	kya	maiñ	to	usi	ka	
tābe'	hooñ	jo	mujhe	waḥi	hoti	hai	aur	maiñ	
nahi	magar	sāf	dar	sunāne	wāla

arabicText: قُلْ أَرَءَيْتُمْ إِن كَانَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَرْتُم بِهِۦ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٌۭ مِّنۢ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثْلِهِۦ فَـَٔامَنَ وَٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“What	is	your	opinion	-	if	the	Qur’an	is	
from	Allah	and	you	have	rejected	faith	in	it,	
and	a	witness	among	the	Descendants	of	Israel	has	already	testified	upon	this	and	accepted	faith,	
while	you	became	arrogant?	Indeed	Allah	does	not	guide	the	unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo		bhalā	dekho	to	agar	woh	Qur’ān	
Allah	ke	pās	se	ho	aur	tum	ne	uska	inkār	kiya	
aur	bani	Israeel	ka	ek	gawah	is	par	gawahi	de	
chuka	to	woh	imān	lāya	aur	tum	ne	takabbur	
kiya	be-shak		Allah	rāh	nahi	deta	Ƶālimoñ	ko.

arabicText: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَوْ كَانَ خَيْرًۭا مَّا سَبَقُونَآ إِلَيْهِ ۚ وَإِذْ لَمْ يَهْتَدُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَسَيَقُولُونَ هَـٰذَآ إِفْكٌۭ قَدِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	disbelievers	said	regarding	the	Muslims,	“If	there	were	any	good	in	it,	the	Muslims	would	
not	have	surpassed	us	in	achieving	it!”;	and	since	they	did	not	receive	guidance	with	it,	they	will	
now	say,	“This	is	an	old	slander.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfiroñ		ne	Musalmanoñ	ko	kahā	agar	is	meiñ	kuchh	bhalāi	hoti	to	yeh	hum	se	āage	is	tak	na	
pahuñch	jāte	aur	jab	unheiñ	uski	hidayat	na	huyi	to	ab	kaheñ	ge	ke	yeh	purāna	bohtān	hai.

arabicText: وَمِن قَبْلِهِۦ كِتَـٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِمَامًۭا وَرَحْمَةًۭ ۚ وَهَـٰذَا كِتَـٰبٌۭ مُّصَدِّقٌۭ لِّسَانًا عَرَبِيًّۭا لِّيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُحْسِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	whereas	before	this	exists	the	Book	of	Moosa,	a	guide	and	a	mercy;	and	this	is	a	Book	giving	
testimony,	in	the	Arabic	language,	to	warn	the	unjust;	and	to	give	glad	tidings	to	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	is	se	pehle	Mūsā	ki	Kitāb	hai	peshwa	aur	meharbāni	aur	yeh	kitāb	hai	tasdeeq	farmāti	Arabi	zubān	
meiñ	ke	zālimoñ	ko	dar	sunaye	aur	nekoñ	ko	bishārat.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسْتَقَـٰمُوا۟ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	said,	“Allah	is	our	Lord”,	and	then	remained	steadfast	-	upon	them	is	neither	
any	fear	nor	shall	they	grieve.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	woh	jinhoñ	ne	kahā	hamāra	Rab	Allah	hai	phir	sābit	qadam	rahe	na	un	par	khauf	na	unko	
gham

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءًۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: They	are	the	People	of	Paradise,	abiding	in	it	forever;	the	reward	of	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	Jannat	wāle	haiñ	hamesha	us	meiñ	raheñge	unke	a’amāl	ka	in’ām.

arabicText: وَوَصَّيْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ إِحْسَـٰنًا ۖ حَمَلَتْهُ أُمُّهُۥ كُرْهًۭا وَوَضَعَتْهُ كُرْهًۭا ۖ وَحَمْلُهُۥ وَفِصَـٰلُهُۥ ثَلَـٰثُونَ شَهْرًا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَبَلَغَ أَرْبَعِينَ سَنَةًۭ قَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِىٓ أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَٰلِدَىَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَـٰلِحًۭا تَرْضَىٰهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِى فِى ذُرِّيَّتِىٓ ۖ إِنِّى تُبْتُ إِلَيْكَ وَإِنِّى مِنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	have	commanded	man	to	be	good	
towards	parents;	his	mother	bore	him	with	
hardship,	and	delivered	him	with	
hardship;	and	carrying	him	and	weaning	
him	is	for	thirty	months;	until	when	he*	
reached	maturity	and	became	forty	years	
of	age,	he	said,	“My	Lord!	Inspire	me	to	be	
thankful	for	the	favours	you	bestowed	
upon	me	and	my	parents,	and	that	I	may	
perform	the	deeds	pleasing	to	You,	and	
keep	merit	among	my	offspring;	I	have	
inclined	towards	you	and	I	am	a	Muslim.”	
(*This verse was revealed concerning 
Sayyiduna Abu Bakr Siddiq	I	-	the first 
caliph)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	hum	ne	āadmi	ko	ḥukm	kiya	ke	apne	
mā	bāp	se	bhalāi	kare	uski	mā	ne	usey	pet	
meiñ	rakha	takleef	se	aur	jani	usko	takleef	
se	aur	usey	uthāye	phirna	aur	uska	doodh	
chhudāna	tees	mahine	meiñ	hai	yahāñ		tak	
ke	jab	apne	zor	ko	pahuñcha	aur	chalees	
baras	ka	huwa	‘arz	ki	aey	mere	Rab	Mere	
dil	meiñ	dāl	ke	maiñ	teri	ne'mat	ka	shukr	
karuñ	jo	tu	ne	mujh	par	aur	mere	mā	bāp	
par	ki	aur	maiñ	woh	kām	karuñ	jo	tujhe	
pasand	āaye	aur	mere	liye	meri	aulād	meiñ	
salāh	(Neki)	rakh	maiñ	teri	taraf	ruju’	lāya	
aur	maiñ	musalman	hooñ

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ نَتَقَبَّلُ عَنْهُمْ أَحْسَنَ مَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَنَتَجَاوَزُ عَن سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ فِىٓ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ۖ وَعْدَ ٱلصِّدْقِ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يُوعَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	the	ones	whose	good	deeds	We	
will	accept,	and	overlook	their	shortfalls	-	
among	the	People	of	Paradise;	a	true	
promise	which	is	being	given	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	haiñ	woh	jin	ki	nekiyañ	hum	qabool	
farmāyeñ	ge	aur	unki	taqseeroñ	se	dar
guzar	farmāyeñ	ge	Jannat	waloñ	meiñ	
sachcha	w’ada	jo	unheiñ	diya	jāta	tha

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِى قَالَ لِوَٰلِدَيْهِ أُفٍّۢ لَّكُمَآ أَتَعِدَانِنِىٓ أَنْ أُخْرَجَ وَقَدْ خَلَتِ ٱلْقُرُونُ مِن قَبْلِى وَهُمَا يَسْتَغِيثَانِ ٱللَّهَ وَيْلَكَ ءَامِنْ إِنَّ وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقٌّۭ فَيَقُولُ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	one	who	said	to	his	parents,	“Uff	-	
I	am	fed	up	with	both	of	you!	What!	You	
promise	me	that	I	will	be	raised	again	
whereas	generations	have	passed	away	
before	me?”	And	they	both	seek	Allah’s	
help	and	say	to	him,	“May	you	be	ruined,	
accept	faith!	Indeed	Allah’s	promise	is	
true”;	he	therefore	answers,	“This	is	
nothing	except	stories	of	former	people.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jis	ne	apne	mā	bāp	se	kahā	uff	tum	
se	dil	pak	gaya	kya	mujhe	yeh	w’ada	dete	
ho	ke	phir	zinda	kiya	jāoñga	halāñke	mujh	
se	pehle	sangateiñ	(Qaumeiñ)	guzar	
chukiñ	aur	woh	donoñ	Allah	se	faryād	
karte	haiñ	teri	kharabi	ho	imān	la	be-shak		
Allah	ka	w’ada	sachcha	hai	to	kehta	hai	yeh	
to	nahi	magar	agloñ	ki	kahāniyañ.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْقَوْلُ فِىٓ أُمَمٍۢ قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ وَٱلْإِنسِ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ خَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	these	upon	whom	the	Word	has	
proved	true,	among	the	nations	that	
passed	away	before	them,	of	jinns	and	
men;	indeed	they	were	losers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	woh	haiñ	jin	par	bāt	sābit	ho	chuki	un	
girohoñ	meiñ	jo	in	se	pehle	guzre	jin	aur	
āadmi	beshak	woh	ziyāñ-kār	(Nuqsān	
wāle)	they

arabicText: وَلِكُلٍّۢ دَرَجَـٰتٌۭ مِّمَّا عَمِلُوا۟ ۖ وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	all	persons	are	ranks	according	to	their	deeds;	and	so	that	He	may	repay	them	in	full	for	
their	deeds,	and	they	will	not	be	wronged.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	har	ek	ke	liye	apne	apne	‘amal	ke	
daraje	haiñ	aur	tāke	Allah	unke	kām	
unheiñ	poore	bhar	de	aur	un	par	zulm	na	hoga

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ يُعْرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَذْهَبْتُمْ طَيِّبَـٰتِكُمْ فِى حَيَاتِكُمُ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِهَا فَٱلْيَوْمَ تُجْزَوْنَ عَذَابَ ٱلْهُونِ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَسْتَكْبِرُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُنتُمْ تَفْسُقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	on	the	day	when	the	disbelievers	will	be	presented	upon	the	fire;	it	will	be	said	to	them,	“You	
have	wasted	your	portion	of	the	good	things	in	the	life	of	this	world	and	enjoyed	them;	so	this	
day	you	will	be	repaid	with	the	disgraceful	punishment,	the	recompense	of	your	wrongfully	
priding	yourself	in	the	land,	and	because	you	used	to	disobey.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jis	din	kāfir	āag		par	pesh	kiye	jāyeñ	ge	un	se	farmāya	jāyega	tum	apne	hisse	ki	pāk	cheezeiñ	
apni	duniya	hi	ki	zindagi	meiñ	fanā	kar	chuke	aur	unheiñ	barat	chuke	to	āaj	tumheiñ	zillat	ka	
‘aƶāb	badla	diya	jāyega	sazā	uski	ke	tum	zameen	meiñ	na-haq	takabbur	karte	they	aur	sazā	uski	
ke	ḥukm	udooli	karte	they

arabicText: ۞ وَٱذْكُرْ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذْ أَنذَرَ قَوْمَهُۥ بِٱلْأَحْقَافِ وَقَدْ خَلَتِ ٱلنُّذُرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَمِنْ خَلْفِهِۦٓ أَلَّا تَعْبُدُوٓا۟ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	the	fellowman	of	the	tribe	
of	A’ad;	when	he	warned	his	nation	in	the	
ahqaf	*	-	and	indeed	Heralds	of	warning	
passed	away	before	and	after	him	-	that,	
“Do	not	worship	anyone	except	Allah;	
indeed	I	fear	the	punishment	of	a	Great	
Day	upon	you.	(* A country among sand 
dunes.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	Āad	ke	hum-qaum	ko	jab	us	
ne	unko	sar-zameen-e	Ahqāf	meiñ	daraya	
aur	be-shak		us	se	pehle	dar	sunāne	wāle	
guzar	chuke	aur	iske	b’ad	āaye	ke	Allah	ke	
siwa	kisi	ko	na	poojo	be-shak	mujhe	tum	
par	ek	bade	din	ke	‘aƶāb		ka	andesha	hai

arabicText: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا لِتَأْفِكَنَا عَنْ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأْتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“Have	you	come	to	us	in	order	to	
turn	us	away	from	our	Gods?	Therefore	
bring	upon	us	what	you	promise	us,	if	you	
are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	kya	tum	is	liye	āaye	ke	hameiñ	
hamāre	m’aboodoñ	se	pher	do	to	hum	par	
lāo	jis	ka	hameiñ	w’ada	dete	ho	agar	tum	
sachche	ho

arabicText: قَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱلْعِلْمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُكُم مَّآ أُرْسِلْتُ بِهِۦ وَلَـٰكِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰكُمْ قَوْمًۭا تَجْهَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
He	said,	“Its	knowledge	is	only	with	Allah;	
and	I	convey	to	you	the	messages	of	my	
Lord,	but	I	perceive	that	you	are	an	
ignorant	nation.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	ne	farmāya	iski	khabar	to	Allah	hi	ke	pās	
hai	maiñ	to	tumheiñ	apne	Rab	ke	payām	
pahuñchāta	hooñ	hāñ	hāñ	meri	dānist	
meiñ	tum	nire	jāhil	log	ho

arabicText: فَلَمَّا رَأَوْهُ عَارِضًۭا مُّسْتَقْبِلَ أَوْدِيَتِهِمْ قَالُوا۟ هَـٰذَا عَارِضٌۭ مُّمْطِرُنَا ۚ بَلْ هُوَ مَا ٱسْتَعْجَلْتُم بِهِۦ ۖ رِيحٌۭ فِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	they	saw	the	punishment	coming	
towards	their	valleys,	spread	like	a	cloud	
on	the	horizon,	they	said,	“That	is	a	cloud	
which	will	shower	rain	upon	us”;	said	Hud	
“In	fact	this	is	what	you	were	being	
impatient	for;	a	windstorm	carrying	a	
painful	punishment.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	unhoñ	ne	‘aƶāb		ko	dekha	bādal	ki	
tarah	āasmān	ke	kināre	meiñ	phaila	huwa	
unki	wādiyoñ	ki	taraf	āata	bole	yeh	bādal	
hai	ke	hum	par	barse	ga	balke	yeh	to	woh	
hai	jis	ki	tum	jaldi	machāte	they	ek	āañdhi	
hai	jis	meiñ	dard-nāk	‘aƶāb	.

arabicText: تُدَمِّرُ كُلَّ شَىْءٍۭ بِأَمْرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ لَا يُرَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَسَـٰكِنُهُمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“That	destroys	all	things	by	the	command	
of	its	Lord”	-	so	at	morning	none	could	be	
seen	except	their	empty	houses;	this	is	the	
sort	of	punishment	We	mete	out	to	the	
guilty.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Har	cheez	ko	tabah	kar	dālti	hai	apne	Rab	
ke	ḥukm		se	to	subah	reh	gaye	ke	nazar	na	
āate	they	magar	unke	soone	(Wirān)	
makān	hum	aisi	hi	saza	dete	haiñ	
mujrimoñ	ko

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ مَكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِيمَآ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰكُمْ فِيهِ وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ سَمْعًۭا وَأَبْصَـٰرًۭا وَأَفْـِٔدَةًۭ فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُمْ سَمْعُهُمْ وَلَآ أَبْصَـٰرُهُمْ وَلَآ أَفْـِٔدَتُهُم مِّن شَىْءٍ إِذْ كَانُوا۟ يَجْحَدُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	had	indeed	given	them	the	means	which	We	have	not	given	you,	and	made	ears	and	eyes	
and	hearts	for	them;	so	their	ears	and	eyes	and	hearts	did	not	benefit	them	at	all	because	they	
used	to	deny	the	signs	of	Allah,	and	the	punishment	they	used	to	mock	at	encompassed	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		hum	ne	unheiñ	woh	maqdoor	diye	they	jo	tum	ko	na	diye	aur	unke	liye	kān	aur	
āañkh	aur	dil	banaye	to	unke	kān	aur	āñkheiñ	aur	dil	kuchh	kām	na	āaye	jabke	woh	Allah	ki	
Āayatoñ	ka	inkār	karte	they	aur	unheiñ	gher	liya	us	‘aƶāb	ne	jiski	hañsi	banāte	they

arabicText: وَلَقَدْ أَهْلَكْنَا مَا حَوْلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفْنَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	indeed	destroyed	townships	surrounding	you,	and	brought	several	signs	so	that	they	
may	desist.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak	hum	ne	halāk	kardi’ñ	tumhāre	āas	pās	ki	bastiyāñ	aur	tarah	tarah	ki	nishāniyāñ	lāye	
ke	woh	b’az	āayeñ

arabicText: فَلَوْلَا نَصَرَهُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ قُرْبَانًا ءَالِهَةًۢ ۖ بَلْ ضَلُّوا۟ عَنْهُمْ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ إِفْكُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	why	did	they	-	the	ones	whom	they	had	chosen	as	Gods	as	a	means	of	attaining	Allah’s	
proximity	-	not	help	them?	In	fact	the	disbelievers	lost	them;	and	this	is	just	their	slander	and	
fabrication.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kyuñ	na	madad	ki	unki	jin	ko	unhoñ	ne	Allah	ke	siwa	qurb	hāsil	karne	ko	khuda	thehra	rakha	
tha	balke	woh	un	se	gum	gaye	aur	yeh	unka	bohtān-o-iftira	hai.

arabicText: وَإِذْ صَرَفْنَآ إِلَيْكَ نَفَرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْجِنِّ يَسْتَمِعُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ فَلَمَّا حَضَرُوهُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنصِتُوا۟ ۖ فَلَمَّا قُضِىَ وَلَّوْا۟ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِم مُّنذِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	when	We	sent	a	number	of	jinns	
towards	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	listening	
attentively	to	the	Qur’an;	so	when	they	
presented	themselves	there,	they	said	to	
each	other,	“Listen	quietly!”;	and	when	the	
recitation	finished,	they	turned	back	to	
their	people,	giving	them	warning.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jab	ke	hum	ne	tumhāri	taraf		kitne	jin	
phere	kān	laga	kar	Qur’ān	sunte	phir	jab	
wahāñ	hāzir	huwe	āapas	meiñ	bole	
khamosh	raho	phir	jab	padhna	ho	chuka	
apni	qaum	ki	taraf	dar	sunāte	palte

arabicText: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰقَوْمَنَآ إِنَّا سَمِعْنَا كِتَـٰبًا أُنزِلَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مُوسَىٰ مُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ يَهْدِىٓ إِلَى ٱلْحَقِّ وَإِلَىٰ طَرِيقٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
They	said,	“O	our	people!	We	have	indeed	
heard	a	Book,	sent	down	after	Moosa,	
which	confirms	the	Books	preceding	it,	
and	guides	towards	the	Truth	and	the	
Straight	Path.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bole	aey	hamāri	qaum	Hum	ne	ek	Kitāb	
suni	ke	Mūsā	ke	b’ad	utāri	gayi	agli	Kitāboñ	
ki	tasdeeq	farmāti	haq	aur	seedhi	rāh	
dikhāti.

arabicText: يَـٰقَوْمَنَآ أَجِيبُوا۟ دَاعِىَ ٱللَّهِ وَءَامِنُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُجِرْكُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“O	our	people!	Listen	to	Allah’s	caller	and	
accept	faith	in	Him,	so	that	He	may	forgive	
you	some	of	your	sins	and	save	you	from	
the	painful	punishment.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	hamāri	qaum	Allah	ke	munādi	ki	bāt	
māno	aur	us	par	Imān	lāo	ke	woh	tumhāre	
kuchh	gunah	bakhsh	de	aur	tumheiñ		dard
nāk	‘aƶāb	se	bachā	le.

arabicText: وَمَن لَّا يُجِبْ دَاعِىَ ٱللَّهِ فَلَيْسَ بِمُعْجِزٍۢ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَيْسَ لَهُۥ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءُ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍۢ مُّبِينٍ
englishTranslationText:
“And	whoever	does	not	listen	to	Allah’s	
caller	cannot	escape	in	the	earth,	and	he	
has	no	supporters	against	Allah;	they	are	
in	open	error.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Allah	ke	munādi	ki	bāt	na	māne	woh	
zameen	meiñ	qābu	se	nikal	kar	jāne	wāla	
nahi	aur	Allah	ke	sāmne	uska	koi	madad	
gār	nahi	woh	khuli	gumrahi	meiñ	haiñ.

arabicText: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَلَمْ يَعْىَ بِخَلْقِهِنَّ بِقَـٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحْـِۧىَ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ ۚ بَلَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Have	they	not	realised	that	Allah,	Who	did	
not	tire	in	creating	the	heavens	and	the	
earth	and	in	creating	them,	is	Able	to	
revive	the	dead?	Surely	yes,	why	not?	
Indeed	He	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	unhoñ	ne	na	jāna	ke	woh	Allah	jis	ne	
āasmān	aur	zameen	banaye	aur	unke	
banāne	meiñ	na	thaka	qādir	hai	ke	murde	
jilaye	(Zinda	kare)	kyuñ	nahi	be-shak		woh	
sab	kuchh	kar	sakta	hai.

arabicText: وَيَوْمَ يُعْرَضُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ أَلَيْسَ هَـٰذَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ قَالُوا۟ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَا ۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَكْفُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	on	the	day	when	the	disbelievers	are	presented	upon	the	fire;	it	will	be	said,	“Is	this	not	a	
reality?”	They	will	answer,	“By	oath	of	our	Lord,	surely	yes,	why	not?”;	it	will	be	said,	“Therefore	
taste	the	punishment,	the	recompense	of	your	disbelief.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jis	din	kāfir	āag		par	pesh	kiye	jāyeñ	ge	
un	se	farmāya	jāyega	kya	ye	haq	nahi	kaheñ	ge	kyuñ	nahi	hamāre	Rab	ki	qasam	farmāya	jāyega	
to	áƶāb	chakho	badla	apne	kufr	ka

arabicText: فَٱصْبِرْ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْعَزْمِ مِنَ ٱلرُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسْتَعْجِل لَّهُمْ ۚ كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمْ يَلْبَثُوٓا۟ إِلَّا سَاعَةًۭ مِّن نَّهَارٍۭ ۚ بَلَـٰغٌۭ ۚ فَهَلْ يُهْلَكُ إِلَّا ٱلْقَوْمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	patiently	endure	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	like	
the	courageous	Noble	Messengers	had	endured,	and	do	not	be	impatient	for	them;	on	the	day	
when	they	see	what	they	are	promised,	it	will	be	as	if	they	had	not	stayed	on	earth	except	part	of	
a	day;	this	is	to	be	conveyed;	will	anyone	be	destroyed,	except	the	disobedient?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	sabr	karo	jaisa	himmat	wāle	Rasooloñ	ne	sabr	kiya	aur	unke	liye	jaldi	na	karo	goya	woh	
jis	din	dekheiñ	ge	jo	unheiñ	w’ada	diya	jāta	hai	duniya	meiñ	na	thehre	they	magar	din	ki	ek	ghadi	
bhar,		yeh	pahuñchāna	hai	to	kaun	halāk	kiye	jāyeñ	ge	magar	be-ḥukm	log.

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	destroyed	the	deeds	of	those	who	
disbelieved	and	prevented	from	Allah’s	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	se	roka	
Allah	ne	unke	āmāl	barbād	kiye

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَءَامَنُوا۟ بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍۢ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَأَصْلَحَ بَالَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	accepted	faith	and	did	good	
deeds	and	believed	in	what	has	been	sent	
down	upon	Muhammad	(peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him)	-	and	that	is	the	truth	from	
their	Lord	-	Allah	has	relieved	them	of	some	
of	their	evils	and	refined	their	condition.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	imān	lāye	aur	achchhe	kām	kiye	aur	
us	par	Imān	lāye	jo	Muhamma	par	utāra	gayā	
aur	wohi	unke	Rab	ke	pās	se	haq	hai	Allah	ne	
unki	burāiyañ	utār	deiñ	aur	unki	halateiñ	
sañwār		deiñ

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَأَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يَضْرِبُ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	the	disbelievers	followed	
falsehood	and	the	believers	followed	the	
Truth	which	is	from	their	Lord;	this	is	how	
Allah	illustrates	the	examples	of	people	to	
them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	kāfir	bātil	ke	pairu	huwe	aur	
imān	waloñ		ne	haq	ki	pairwi	ki	jo	unke	Rab	
ki	taraf	se	hai	Allah	logoñ	se	unke	ahwāl	
yooñ	hi	bayān	farmāta	hai

arabicText: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَضَرْبَ ٱلرِّقَابِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَثْخَنتُمُوهُمْ فَشُدُّوا۟ ٱلْوَثَاقَ فَإِمَّا مَنًّۢا بَعْدُ وَإِمَّا فِدَآءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ ٱلْحَرْبُ أَوْزَارَهَا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَوْ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ لَٱنتَصَرَ مِنْهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لِّيَبْلُوَا۟ بَعْضَكُم بِبَعْضٍۢ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَن يُضِلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	you	confront	the	disbelievers,	strike	
at	their	necks;	until	when	you	have	slain	
them	in	plenty,	tie	them	up	firmly;	then	after	
that,	you	may	either	release	them	as	a	favour	
or	take	ransom,	until	the	war	lays	down	its	
ordeal;	this	is	it;	and	had	Allah	willed	He	
Himself	could	have	taken	revenge	from	them,	
but	this	is	to	test	some	of	you	with	others;	
and	Allah	will	surely	never	waste	the	deeds	
of	those	who	were	killed	in	His	way.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	jab	kāfiroñ	se	tumhāra	sāmna	ho	to	
gardaneiñ	mārna	hai	yahāñ	tak	ke	jab	
unheiñ	khoob	qatl	karlo	to	mazboot	bāñdho	
phir	iske	b’ad	chāhe	ehsān	karke	chord	do	
chāhe	fidya	lelo	yahāñ		tak	ke	ladāi	apna	bojh	
rakh	de	bāt	yeh	hai	aur	Allah	chāhta	to	āap		
hi	un	se	badla	leta	magar	is	liye	ke	tum	meiñ	
ek	ko	doosre	se	jāñche	aur	jo	Allah	ki	rāh	
meiñ	māre	gaye	Allah	hargiz	unke	‘amal	
zāaye	na	farmāye	ga

arabicText: سَيَهْدِيهِمْ وَيُصْلِحُ بَالَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
He	will	soon	guide	them	(towards	
Paradise)	and	make	them	succeed.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jald	unheiñ	rāh	dega	aur	unka	kām	banā	
dega

arabicText: وَيُدْخِلُهُمُ ٱلْجَنَّةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	He	will	admit	them	into	Paradise	-	
they	have	been	made	familiar	with	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unheiñ	Jannat	meiñ	le	jāyega unheiñ	
uski	pehchān	kara	di	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن تَنصُرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرْكُمْ وَيُثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَكُمْ
englishTranslationText: O	People	who	Believe!	If	you	help	the	religion	of	Allah,	He	will	help	you	and	will	stabilise	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Agar	tum	Deen-e	Khuda	ki	madad	karoge	Allah	tumhāri	madad	karega	aur	tumhāre	
qadam	jama	dega

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فَتَعْسًۭا لَّهُمْ وَأَضَلَّ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText: And	for	those	who	disbelieve	-	may	they	be	ruined,	and	may	Allah	destroy	all	their	deeds!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	to	un	par	tabāhi	pade	aur	Allah	unke	a’amāl	barbād	kare.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ كَرِهُوا۟ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText: This	is	because	they	disliked	what	Allah	has	sent	down	-	He	has	therefore	squandered	all	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	is	liye	ke	unheiñ	na-gawār	huwa	jo	Allah	ne	utāra	to	Allah	ne	unka	kiya	dhara	akārat	kiya.

arabicText: ۞ أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَيَنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ دَمَّرَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ وَلِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَمْثَـٰلُهَا
englishTranslationText:
So	did	they	not	travel	in	the	land	to	see	what	sort	of	fate	befell	those	who	preceded	them?	Allah	
poured	ruin	upon	them;	and	for	the	disbelievers	are	several	like	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	unhoñ	ne	zameen	meiñ	safar	na	kiya	ke	dekhte	un	se	aglon	ka	kaisa	anjām	huwa	Allah	ne	un	
par	tabāhi	dāli	aur	in	kāfiroñ	ke	liye	bhi	waisi	kitni	hi	haiñ

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مَوْلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَأَنَّ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ لَا مَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	Allah	is	the	Supporter	of	the	believers,	whereas	the	disbelievers	do	not	have	any	
supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	is	liye	ke	Musalmanoñ	ka	maula	Allah	hai	aur	kāfiroñ		ka	koi	maula	nahi.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأْكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأْكُلُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ وَٱلنَّارُ مَثْوًۭى لَّهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	will	indeed	admit	those	who	believed	
and	did	good	deeds	into	Gardens	beneath	
which	rivers	flow;	and	the	disbelievers	
enjoy,	and	they	eat	like	the	cattle	eat,	and	
their	destination	is	in	the	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	Allah	dākhil	farmāye	ga	unheiñ	jo	
Imān	lāye	aur	achchhe	kām	kiye	bāghoñ	
meiñ	jinke	neeche	nehreiñ		rawāñ	aur	kāfir	
barat-te	haiñ	aur	khāte	haiñ	jaise	chaupaye	
khāyeñ	aur	āag		meiñ	unka	thikāna	hai.

arabicText: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ هِىَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّةًۭ مِّن قَرْيَتِكَ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَخْرَجَتْكَ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	many	a	township	existed	which	was	
stronger	than	your	town	(O	dear	Prophet	
Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	-	those	who	removed	you	from	your	
town	-	We	destroyed	them,	so	they	do	not	
have	a	supporter!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kitne	hi	shaher	ke	is	shaher	se	quwwat	
meiñ	ziyada	they	jis	ne	tumheiñ	tumhāre	
shaher	se	bāhar	kiya	hum	ne	unheiñ	halāk	
farmāya	to	unka	koi	madad-gār	nahi.

arabicText: أَفَمَن كَانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ كَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُم
englishTranslationText:
So	will	one	who	is	upon	on	a	clear	proof	
from	his	Lord,	ever	be	like	any	of	those	
whose	evil	deeds	are	made	to	appear	good	
to	them	and	they	follow	their	own	desires?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	jo	apne	Rab	ki	taraf	se	raushan	
daleel	par	ho	us	jaisa	hoga	jis	ke	bure	‘amal	
usey	bhale	dikhāye	gaye	aur	woh	apni	
khwahishon	ke	peechhe	chale

arabicText: مَّثَلُ ٱلْجَنَّةِ ٱلَّتِى وُعِدَ ٱلْمُتَّقُونَ ۖ فِيهَآ أَنْهَـٰرٌۭ مِّن مَّآءٍ غَيْرِ ءَاسِنٍۢ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌۭ مِّن لَّبَنٍۢ لَّمْ يَتَغَيَّرْ طَعْمُهُۥ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌۭ مِّنْ خَمْرٍۢ لَّذَّةٍۢ لِّلشَّـٰرِبِينَ وَأَنْهَـٰرٌۭ مِّنْ عَسَلٍۢ مُّصَفًّۭى ۖ وَلَهُمْ فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ ٱلثَّمَرَٰتِ وَمَغْفِرَةٌۭ مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ كَمَنْ هُوَ خَـٰلِدٌۭ فِى ٱلنَّارِ وَسُقُوا۟ مَآءً حَمِيمًۭا فَقَطَّعَ أَمْعَآءَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
A	description	of	the	Garden	which	is	
promised	to	the	pious;	in	it	are	rivers	of	
water	which	shall	never	pollute;	and	rivers	
of	milk	the	taste	of	which	shall	never	
change;	and	rivers	of	wine	delicious	to	
drink;	and	rivers	of	purified	honey;	and	in	
it	for	them	are	fruits	of	all	kinds,	and	the	
forgiveness	of	their	Lord;	so	will	such	ever	
be	equal	to	those	who	are	to	stay	in	the	fire	
for	ever	and	who	will	be	given	boiling	
water	to	drink	so	that	it	tears	their	guts	
apart?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ahwāl	us	Jannat	ka	jis	ka	w’ada	parhez
gāron	se	hai	us	meiñ	aisi	pāni	ki	nehreiñ		
haiñ	jo	kabhi	na	bigde	aur	aise	doodh	ki	
nehreiñ	haiñ	jis	ka	mazā	na	badla	aur	aisi	
sharāb	ki	nehreiñ		haiñ	jis	ke	peene	meiñ	
lazzat	hai	aur	aisi	shahed	ki	nehreiñ		haiñ	
jo	sāf	kiya	gayā	aur	unke	liye	us	meiñ	har	
qism	ke	phal	haiñ	aur	apne	Rab	ki	
maghfirat	kya	aise	chain	wāle	unki	barabar	
ho	jāyeñ	ge	jinheiñ	hamesha	āag	meiñ	
rehna	aur	unheiñ	khaulta	pāni	pilaya	jāye	
ke	āañtoñ	ke	tukde	tukde	karde

arabicText: وَمِنْهُم مَّن يَسْتَمِعُ إِلَيْكَ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا خَرَجُوا۟ مِنْ عِندِكَ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًا ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓا۟ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	them	are	some	who	listen	to	
what	you	say;	until	when	they	go	away	
from	you,	they	say	to	those	who	have	been	
given	knowledge,	“What	did	he	say	now?”;	
they	are	those	whose	hearts	Allah	has	
sealed,	and	they	follow	their	own	desires.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	meiñ	se	b’az	tumhāre	irshād	sunte	
haiñ	yahāñ		tak	ke	jab	tumhāre	pās	se	nikal	
kar	jāyeñ	‘Ilm	waloñ	se	kehte	haiñ	abhi	
unhoñ	ne	kya	farmāya	yeh	haiñ	woh	jin	ke	
diloñ	par	Allah	ne	mohar	kar	di	aur	apni	
khwahishon	ke	tābe'	huwe

arabicText: فَهَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةًۭ ۖ فَقَدْ جَآءَ أَشْرَاطُهَا ۚ فَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمْ إِذَا جَآءَتْهُمْ ذِكْرَىٰهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	attained	the	right	path	-	Allah	increases	the	guidance	for	them	and	bestows	their	
piety	to	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	rāh	pāyi	Allah	ne	unki	
hidayat	aur	ziyada	farmayi	aur	unki	
parhez-gāri	unheiñ	‘aṭa	farmayi

arabicText: فَٱعْلَمْ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لِذَنۢبِكَ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمْ وَمَثْوَىٰكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
So	what	are	they	waiting	for,	except	that	the	Last	Day	suddenly	come	upon	them?	For	its	signs	
have	already	appeared;	so	when	it	does	come,	of	what	use	is	their	realising	it?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kāhe	ke	intezār	meiñ	haiñ	magar	Qiyamat	ke	ke	un	par	achānak	āa	jāye	ke	iski	‘alāmateiñ		to	
āa	hi	chuki	haiñ	phir	jab	woh	āa	jāye	gi	to	kahāñ	woh	aur	kahān	unka	samajhna

arabicText: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَوْلَا نُزِّلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ ۖ فَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتْ سُورَةٌۭ مُّحْكَمَةٌۭ وَذُكِرَ فِيهَا ٱلْقِتَالُ ۙ رَأَيْتَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَيْكَ نَظَرَ ٱلْمَغْشِىِّ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ فَأَوْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	know	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	that	there	is	none	
worthy	of	worship	except	Allah,	and	seek	the	forgiveness	of	sins	of	your	close	ones	and	for	the	
common	believing	men	and	women;	and	Allah	knows	your	movements	during	the	day	and	your	
resting	during	the	night.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	jān	lo	ke	Allah	ke	siwa	kisi	ki	bandagi	nahi	aur	aey	Mehboob	apne	khāsoñ	aur	āam	Musalman	
mardoñ	aur	aurtoñ	ke	gunahoñ	ki	mu'āfi	māñgo	aur	Allah	jānta	hai	din	ko	tumhāra	phirna	aur	
rāt	ko	tumhāra	āarām	lena.

arabicText: طَاعَةٌۭ وَقَوْلٌۭ مَّعْرُوفٌۭ ۚ فَإِذَا عَزَمَ ٱلْأَمْرُ فَلَوْ صَدَقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	Muslims	say,	“Why	was	not	a	
chapter	sent	down?”	So	when	a	positive	
chapter	was	sent	down,	and	war	was	
commanded	in	it,	you	will	see	those	in	
whose	hearts	is	a	disease	looking	at	you	
with	the	dazed	looks	of	a	dying	man;	so	it	
would	be	better	for	them.	-
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Musalman	kehte	haiñ	koi	soorat	kyuñ	
na	utāri	gayi	phir	jab	koi	pukhta	soorat	
utāri	gayi	aur	us	meiñ	jihād	ka	ḥukm		
farmāya	gayā	to	tum	dekhoge	unheiñ	jin	ke	
diloñ	meiñ	bimāri	hai	ke	tumhāri	taraf	
uska	dekhna	dekhte	haiñ	jis	par	murdani	
chhayi	ho	to	unke	haq	meiñ	behtar	yeh	tha	
ke	farmāñ	bardāri	karte.

arabicText: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓا۟ أَرْحَامَكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
To	obey	and	speak	good;	so	when	the	
manifest	command	came	-	it	would	have	
been	better	for	them	if	they	had	remained	
faithful	to	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	achchhi	bāt	kehte	phir	jab	ḥukm		nātiq	
ho	chuka	to	agar	Allah	ke	sachche	rehte	to	
unka	bhala	tha.

arabicText: فَهَلْ عَسَيْتُمْ إِن تَوَلَّيْتُمْ أَن تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓا۟ أَرْحَامَكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
So	do	you	*	portray	that	if	you	get	
governance,	you	would	spread	chaos	in	the	
land	and	sever	your	relations?	(*	The	
hypocrites)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	tumhāre	yeh	lachchhan	(Andāz)	
nazar	āate	haiñ	ke	agar	tumheiñ		hukumat	
mile	to	zameen	meiñ	fasād	phailāo	aur	
apne	rishte	kāt	do.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	these	whom	Allah	has	cursed,	so	He	
made	them	deaf	to	the	Truth	and	blinded	
their	eyes.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	haiñ	woh	log	jin	par	Allah	ne	l’anat	ki	
aur	unheiñ	haq	se	behra	kar	diya	aur	unki	
āañkheiñ	phod	deiñ

arabicText: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ أَمْ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَقْفَالُهَآ
englishTranslationText:
So	do	they	not	ponder	the	Qur’an	deeply,	
or	are	there	locks	on	some	of	their	hearts?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	woh	Qur’ān	ko	sochte	nahi	ya	
ba’zay	diloñ		par	unke	qufl	lage	haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرْتَدُّوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ أَدْبَـٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَى ۙ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمْ وَأَمْلَىٰ لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	turn	back	after	the	
guidance	had	become	clear	to	them	-	Satan	
has	deceived	them;	and	made	them	
optimistic	of	living	for	ages.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	woh	jo	apne	peeche	palat	gaye	b’ad	
iske	ke	hidayat	un	par	khul	chuki	thi	
shaitān	ne	unheiñ	fareb	diya	aur	unheiñ	
duniya	meiñ	muddaton	rehne	ki	ummeed	
dilayi

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُوا۟ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمْ فِى بَعْضِ ٱلْأَمْرِ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ إِسْرَارَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	they	said	to	those	who	
dislike	what	Allah	has	sent	down,	“We	will	
obey	you	regarding	one	matter	*”;	and	
Allah	knows	their	secrets.	(*	To	fight	against	the	Holy	Prophet).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	unhoñ	ne	kahā	un	logoñ	se	jinheiñ	Allah	ka	utāra	huwa	na-gawār	hai	ek	kām	meiñ	
hum	tumhāri	māneñ	ge	aur	Allah	unki	chupi	huyi	jānta	hai

arabicText: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتْهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضْرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمْ وَأَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
So	how	(dreadful)	will	it	be	when	the	angels	remove	their	souls,	striking	at	their	faces	and	their	
backs!
romanUrduTranslationText: To	kaisa	hoga	jab	Firishte	unki	rooh	qabz	kareñ	ge	unke	moñh	aur	unki	peetheiñ	mārte	huwe

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَآ أَسْخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُوا۟ رِضْوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	because	they	followed	the	matter	which	displeases	Allah,	and	they	disliked	what	pleases	
Him	-	He	therefore	squandered	away	all	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	is	liye	ke	woh	aisi	bāt	ke	tābe'	huwe	jis	meiñ	Allah	ki	na-rāzi	hai	aur	uski	khushi	unheiñ	
gawāra	na	huyi	to	us	ne	unke	a’amāl	akārat	kar	diye.

arabicText: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخْرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضْغَـٰنَهُمْ
englishTranslationText: What!	Do	they,	in	whose	hearts	is	a	disease,	fancy	that	Allah	will	not	expose	concealed	enmities?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	jinke	diloñ	meiñ	bimāri	hai	is	ghamand	meiñ	haiñ	ke	Allah	unke	chupe	bair	(Chupi	dushmani)	
zāhir	na	farmaye	ga

arabicText: وَلَوْ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيْنَـٰكَهُمْ فَلَعَرَفْتَهُم بِسِيمَـٰهُمْ ۚ وَلَتَعْرِفَنَّهُمْ فِى لَحْنِ ٱلْقَوْلِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	We	will,	We	can	show	them	to	you	
so	that	you	may	recognise	them	by	their	
faces;	and	you	will	surely	recognise	them	
by	the	way	they	talk;	and	Allah	knows	your	
deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	hum	chāheiñ	to	tumheiñ	unko	
dikha	deiñ	ke	tum	unki	soorat	se	pehchān	
lo	aur	zaroor	tum	unheiñ	bāt	ke	usloob	
meiñ	pehchān	loge	aur	Allah	tumhāre	amal	
jānta	hai

arabicText: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ حَتَّىٰ نَعْلَمَ ٱلْمُجَـٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَنَبْلُوَا۟ أَخْبَارَكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
And	We	shall	indeed	test	you	until	We	
make	known	the	warriors	and	the	
steadfast	among	you	-	and	to	test	your	
proclamations.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zaroor	hum	tumheiñ	jāñcheñ	ge	yahāñ,	
tak	ke	dekh	leiñ	tumhāre	jihād	karne	
waloñ	aur	sābiroñ	ko	aur	tumhāri	
khabreiñ	āazma	leiñ

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلْهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّوا۟ ٱللَّهَ شَيْـًۭٔا وَسَيُحْبِطُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	disbelieved	and	
prevented	others	from	Allah’s	way,	and	
opposed	the	Noble	Messenger	after	the	
guidance	had	become	clear	to	them	-	they	
cannot	harm	Allah	in	the	least;	and	soon	He	
will	squander	away	their	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		woh	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	Allah	
ki	rāh	se	roka	aur	Rasool	ki	mukhalifat	ki	
b’ād	iske	ke	hidayat	un	par	zāhir	ho	chuki	
thi	woh	hargiz	Allah	ko	kuch	nuqsān	na	
pahuñchayeñ	ge	aur	bahut	jald	Allah	unka	
kiya	dharā	akārat	kar	dega

arabicText: ۞ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُوا۟ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبْطِلُوٓا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ ٣٣
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Obey	Allah	and	obey	
the	Noble	Messenger,	and	do	not	render	
your	deeds	void.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Allah	ka	ḥukm	māno	aur	
Rasool	ka	ḥukm	māno	aur	apne	‘amal	bātil	
na	karo

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوا۟ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌۭ فَلَن يَغْفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	disbelieved	and	
prevented	others	from	Allah’s	way,	and	
then	died	as	disbelievers	-	so	Allah	will	
never	forgive	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	Allah	ki	rāh	
se	roka	phir	kāfir	hi	mar	gaye	to	Allah	
hargiz	unheiñ	na	bakhshe	ga

arabicText: فَلَا تَهِنُوا۟ وَتَدْعُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّلْمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْأَعْلَوْنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمْ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمْ أَعْمَـٰلَكُمْ ٣٥
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	do	not	relax,	nor	call	towards	
truce	by	yourself;	and	it	is	you	who	will	
dominate;	and	Allah	is	with	you,	and	He	
will	never	cause	a	loss	in	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	tum	susti	na	karo	aur	āap	sulah	ki	taraf	
na	bulao	aur	tum	hi	ghalib	āao	ge	aur	Allah	
tumhāre	sāth	hai	aur	woh	hargiz	tumhāre	
āmāl	meiñ	tumheiñ	nuqsān	na	dega

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَا لَعِبٌۭ وَلَهْوٌۭ ۚ وَإِن تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَتَتَّقُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمْ أُجُورَكُمْ وَلَا يَسْـَٔلْكُمْ أَمْوَٰلَكُمْ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Duniya	ki	zindagi	to	yehi	khel	kood	hai	aur	agar	tum	Imān	lāo	aur	parhez-gāri	karo	to	woh	tum	
ko	tumhāre	sawāb	‘aṭa	farmāye	ga	aur	kuchh	tum	se	tumhāre	māl	na	māñge	ga

arabicText: إِن يَسْـَٔلْكُمُوهَا فَيُحْفِكُمْ تَبْخَلُوا۟ وَيُخْرِجْ أَضْغَـٰنَكُمْ
englishTranslationText:
Were	He	to	ask	it	from	you,	and	ask	in	plenty,	you	would	be	miserly,	and	the	miserliness	would	
expose	the	filth	within	your	hearts.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Agar	unheiñ	tum	se	talab	kare	aur	ziyada	talab	kare	tum	bukhl	karoge	aur	woh	bukhl	tumhāre	
diloñ	ke	mail	zāhir	kar	dega.

arabicText: هَـٰٓأَنتُمْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدْعَوْنَ لِتُنفِقُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبْخَلُ ۖ وَمَن يَبْخَلْ فَإِنَّمَا يَبْخَلُ عَن نَّفْسِهِۦ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْغَنِىُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلْفُقَرَآءُ ۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ يَسْتَبْدِلْ قَوْمًا غَيْرَكُمْ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓا۟ أَمْثَـٰلَكُم
englishTranslationText:
Yes,	undoubtedly	it	is	you	who	are	being	called,	that	you	may	spend	in	Allah’s	way;	so	some	
among	you	act	miserly;	and	whoever	is	miserly,	is	being	a	miser	upon	himself;	and	Allah	is	the	
Independent	(Wealthy	-	Not	requiring	anything),	whereas	you	all	are	needy;	and	if	you	renege,	He	
will	replace	you	with	other	people	-	and	they	will	not	be	like	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	hāñ	yeh	jo	tum	ho	bulaye	jāte	ho	ke	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	kharch	karo	to	tum	meiñ	koi	bukhl	
karta	hai	aur	jo	bukhl	kare	woh	apni	hi	jān	par	bukhl	karta	hai	aur	Allah	be-niyāz	hai	aur	tum	sab	
mohtāj	aur	agar	tum	muñh	phero	to	woh	tumhāre	siwa	aur	log	badal	lega	phir	woh	tum	jaise	na	
hoñge.

arabicText: إِنَّا فَتَحْنَا لَكَ فَتْحًۭا مُّبِينًۭا
englishTranslationText:
We	have	indeed,	for	your	sake	(O dear 
Prophet Muhammad - peace and 
blessings be upon him),	bestowed	a	clear	
victory.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	hum	ne	tumhāre	liye	raushan	
fatah	farma	di

arabicText: لِّيَغْفِرَ لَكَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنۢبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعْمَتَهُۥ عَلَيْكَ وَيَهْدِيَكَ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
So	that	Allah	may	forgive,	for	your	sake,	
the	sins	of	those	before	you	and	those	after	
you,	and	complete	His	favours	upon	you,	
and	to	show	you	the	Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tākay	Allah	tumhāre	sabab	se	gunāh	
bakhshe	tumhāre	agloñ	ke	aur	tumhāre	
pichhloñ	ke	aur	apni	ne'mateiñ	tum	par	
tamām	kar	de	aur	tumheiñ		seedhi	rāh	
dikha	de

arabicText: وَيَنصُرَكَ ٱللَّهُ نَصْرًا عَزِيزًا
englishTranslationText:
And	so	that	Allah	may	provide	you	a	great	
help.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	tumhāri	zabardast	madad	
farmaye

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ لِيَزْدَادُوٓا۟ إِيمَـٰنًۭا مَّعَ إِيمَـٰنِهِمْ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	instilled	peace	in	the	hearts	of	
the	believers,	so	that	it	may	increase	their	
strength	of	conviction;	and	to	Allah	only	
belong	the	armies	of	the	heavens	and	the	
earth;	and	Allah	is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	Imān	waloñ		ke	diloñ		meiñ	
itminān	utāra	tāke	unheiñ	yaqeen	par	
yaqeen	badhe	aur	Allah	hi	ki	milk	haiñ	
tamām	lashkar	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ke	
aur	Allah	‘ilm-o-hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ فَوْزًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
In	order	to	admit	the	believing	men	and	
believing	women	into	Gardens	beneath	
which	rivers	flow,	in	which	they	will	abide,	
and	to	relieve	them	of	their	misdeeds;	and	
this,	in	Allah’s	sight,	is	the	greatest	success.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tākay	Imān	wāle	mardoñ	aur	imān	wāli	
aurtoñ	ko	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	jāye	jinke	
neeche	nehreiñ		rawāñ	hamesha	un	meiñ	
raheñ	aur	unki	burāiyañ	un	se	utār	de	aur	
yeh	Allah	ke	yahāñ		badi	kāmyābi	hai.

arabicText: وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقَـٰتِ وَٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ وَٱلْمُشْرِكَـٰتِ ٱلظَّآنِّينَ بِٱللَّهِ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۚ عَلَيْهِمْ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوْءِ ۖ وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَعَنَهُمْ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمْ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ وَسَآءَتْ مَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	to	punish	the	hypocrite	men	and	
hypocrite	women,	and	the	polytheist	men	
and	polytheist	women,	who	think	evilly	about	Allah;	upon	them	only	is	the	evil	cycle	of	
misfortune;	and	Allah	has	wreaked	anger	upon	them,	and	has	cursed	them,	and	has	prepared	hell	
for	them;	and	what	an	evil	destination
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	áƶāb		de	munafiq	mardoñ	aur	munafiq	aurtoñ	aur	mushrik	mardoñ	aur	mushrik	aurtoñ	ko	
jo	Allah	par	bura	gumān	rakhte	haiñ	unhiñ	par	hai	buri	gardish	aur	Allah	ne	un	par	ghazab	
farmāya	aur	unheiñ	l’anat	ki	aur	un	ke	liye	Jahannam	tayyār	farmāya	aur	woh	kya	hi	bura	anjām	
hai

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
And	to	Allah	only	belong	the	armies	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	Allah	is	Most	Honourable,	
Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	Allah	hi	ki	milk	haiñ	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ke	sab	lashkar	aur	Allah	‘izzat-o-hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ شَـٰهِدًۭا وَمُبَشِّرًۭا وَنَذِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
We	have	indeed	sent	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him)	as	a	
present	witness	and	a	Herald	of	glad	tidings	and	warnings.	(The Holy Prophet is a witness from 
Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak		hum	ne	tumheiñ		bheja	hāzir-o-nāzir	aur	khushi	aur	dar	sunāta

arabicText: لِّتُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكْرَةًۭ وَأَصِيلًا
englishTranslationText:
In	order	that	you,	O	people,	may	accept	faith	in	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger,	and	honour	
and	revere	the	Noble	Messenger;	and	may	say	the	Purity	of	Allah,	morning	and	evening.	(To	
honour	the	Holy	Prophet	–	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him	–	is	part	of	faith.	To	disrespect	him	
is	blasphemy.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tākay	aey	logo!	Tum	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	par	Imān	lāo	aur	Rasool	ki	tazeem-o-tauqeer	karo	
aur	subah-o	shām	Allah	ki	pāki	bolo

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ فَوْقَ أَيْدِيهِمْ ۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِمَا عَـٰهَدَ عَلَيْهُ ٱللَّهَ فَسَيُؤْتِيهِ أَجْرًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	swear	allegiance	to	you	(O	dear	
Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him),	do	indeed	in	fact	swear	
allegiance	to	Allah;	Allah's	Hand*	of	Power	
is	above	their	hands;	so	whoever	breaches	
his	oath,	has	breached	his	own	greater	
promise;	and	whoever	fulfils	the	covenant	
he	has	with	Allah	-	so	very	soon	Allah	will	
bestow	upon	him	a	great	reward.	(Used	as	
a	metaphor.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	tumhāri	bai'at	karte	haiñ	woh	to	
Allah	hi	se	bai'at	karte	haiñ	unke	hāthoñ	
par	Allah	ka	hāth	hai	to	jis	ne	‘ahed	toda	us	
ne	apne	bude	ahed	ko	toda	aur	jis	ne	poora	
kiya	woh	‘ahed	jo	us	ne	Allah	se	kiya	tha	to	
bahut	jald	Allah	usey	bada	sawāb	dega

arabicText: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ شَغَلَتْنَآ أَمْوَٰلُنَا وَأَهْلُونَا فَٱسْتَغْفِرْ لَنَا ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلْسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيْسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ ۚ قُلْ فَمَن يَمْلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًٔا إِنْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ ضَرًّا أَوْ أَرَادَ بِكُمْ نَفْعًۢا ۚ بَلْ كَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ خَبِيرًۢا
englishTranslationText:
The	ignorant	ones	who	had	stayed	behind	
will	now	say	to	you,	“Our	wealth	and	our	
families	prevented	us	from	going	by	
keeping	us	pre-occupied,	therefore	seek	
forgiveness	for	us”;	they	utter	with	their	
tongues	what	is	not	in	their	hearts;	say,	“So	
does	anyone	have	any	control	over	you	
against	Allah,	if	He	wills	to	harm	you	or	
provide	you	benefit?	In	fact	Allah	is	Aware	
of	what	you	do.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	tum	se	kaheñge	jo	ganwār	(Dihāti)	
peechhe	reh	gaye	they	ke	hameiñ	hamāre	
māl	aur	hamāre	ghar	waloñ		ne	jāne	se	
mashgool	rakha	ab	huzoor	hamāri	
maghfirat	chāheiñ	apni	zubānoñ	se	woh	
bāt	kehte	haiñ	jo	unke	diloñ		meiñ	nahi	tum	
farmāo	to	Allah	ke	sāmne	kise	tumhāra	
kuchh	ikhtiyār	hai	agar	woh	tumhāra	bura	
chāhe	ya	tumhāri	bhalāi	ka	irāda	farmaye	
balke	Allah	ko	tumhāre	kāmoñ	ki	khabar	
hai.

arabicText: بَلْ ظَنَنتُمْ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِيهِمْ أَبَدًۭا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَظَنَنتُمْ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوْءِ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًۢا بُورًۭا
englishTranslationText:
“Rather	you	had	assumed	that	the	Noble	
Messenger	and	the	Muslims	will	never	
return	to	their	homes,	and	you	thought	this	
as	good	within	your	hearts,	whereas	you	
had	thought	evilly;	and	you	were	a	people	
about	to	be	ruined.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	tum	to	yeh	samjhe	huwe	they	ke	
Rasool	aur	Musalman	hargiz	gharoñ	ko	
wāpas	na	āayeñ		ge	aur	usi	ko	apne	diloñ		
meiñ	bhalā	samjhe	huwe	they	aur	tum	ne	
bura	gumān	kiya	aur	tum	halāk	hone	wāle	
log	they

arabicText: وَمَن لَّمْ يُؤْمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ فَإِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَعِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	does	not	accept	faith	in	Allah	
and	His	Noble	Messenger	-	We	have	indeed	
kept	prepared	a	blazing	fire	for	
disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo	Imān	na	lāye	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	
par	to	be-shak	hum	ne	kāfiroñ		ke	liye	
bhadakti	āag		tayyār	kar	rakhi	hai.

arabicText: وَلِلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَغْفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورًۭا رَّحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	for	Allah	only	is	the	kingship	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	He	may	forgive	whomever	He	
wills,	and	punish	whomever	He	wills;	and	Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	hi	ke	liye	hai	āasmānon	aur	zameen	ki	saltanat	jise	chāhe	bakhshe	aur	jise	chāhe	‘aƶāb		
kare	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: سَيَقُولُ ٱلْمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا ٱنطَلَقْتُمْ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأْخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعْكُمْ ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُوا۟ كَلَـٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلْ تَحْسُدُونَنَا ۚ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ لَا يَفْقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	had	stayed	behind	will	now	say,	“When	you	go	to	receive	the	war	booty,	let	us	also	go	
with	you”;	they	wish	to	change	the	Words	of	Allah;	say	“You	shall	never	come	with	us	-	this	is	
already	decreed	by	Allah”;	so	they	will	now	say,	“But	rather	you	envy	us”;	in	fact	they	never	
understood	except	a	little.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ab	kaheñ	ge	peechhe	baith	rehne	wāle	jab	tum	ghanimateiñ	lene	chalo	to	hameiñ	bhi	apne	
peechhe	āane	do	woh	chāhte	haiñ	Allah	ka	kalām	badal	deiñ	tum	farmāo		hargiz	tum	hamāre	sāth	
na	āao	Allah	ne	pehle	se	yooñ	hi	farmā	diya	hai	to	ab	kaheñ	ge	balke	tum	hum	se	jalte	ho	balke	
woh	bāt	na	samajhte	they	magar	thodi.

arabicText: قُل لِّلْمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ ٱلْأَعْرَابِ سَتُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ أُو۟لِى بَأْسٍۢ شَدِيدٍۢ تُقَـٰتِلُونَهُمْ أَوْ يُسْلِمُونَ ۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ يُؤْتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجْرًا حَسَنًۭا ۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوْا۟ كَمَا تَوَلَّيْتُم مِّن قَبْلُ يُعَذِّبْكُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Say	to	the	ignorant	who	stayed	behind,	
“You	will	soon	be	called	against	a	nation	of	
great	military	strength	-	to	fight	against	
them	or	that	they	become	Muslims;	so	if	
you	obey,	Allah	will	give	you	an	excellent	
reward;	and	if	you	turn	away,	the	way	you	
had	turned	away	before,	He	will	mete	out	a	
painful	punishment	to	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Un	peeche	reh	gaye	huwe	gawāroñ	se	
farmāo	‘an-qareeb	tum	ek	sakht	ladāi	wāli	
qaum	ki	taraf	bulaye	jāoge	ke	un	se	lado	ya	
woh	Musalman	ho	jāyeñ	phir	agar	tum	
farmān	māno	ge	Allah	tumheiñ	achchha	
sawāb	dega	aur	agar	phir	jāo	ge	jaise	pehle	
phir	gaye	to	tumheiñ		dard-nāk	‘aƶāb		dega.

arabicText: لَّيْسَ عَلَى ٱلْأَعْمَىٰ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْأَعْرَجِ حَرَجٌۭ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلْمَرِيضِ حَرَجٌۭ ۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدْخِلْهُ جَنَّـٰتٍۢ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبْهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
There	is	no	reproach	upon	the	blind,	nor	
reproach	against	the	lame,	nor	reproach	
upon	the	sick;	and	whoever	obeys	Allah	
and	His	Noble	Messenger	-	Allah	will	admit	
him	into	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	
flow;	and	whoever	turns	away	-	He	will	
mete	out	a	painful	punishment	to	him.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Andhe	par	tangi	nahi	aur	na	langde	par	
muzāiqa	aur	na	bimār	par	muwākhaza	aur	
jo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	ka	ḥukm		māne	
Allah	usey	bāghoñ	meiñ	le	jāyega	jinke	
neeche	nehreiñ		rawāñ	aur	jo	phir	jāyega	
usey	Dard	nāk	‘aƶāb		farmayega.

arabicText: ۞ لَّقَدْ رَضِىَ ٱللَّهُ عَنِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ إِذْ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحْتَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمْ فَأَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ عَلَيْهِمْ وَأَثَـٰبَهُمْ فَتْحًۭا قَرِيبًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	Allah	was	truly	pleased	with	the	
believers	when	they	swore	allegiance	to	
you	beneath	the	tree	-	so	He	knew	what	
was	in	their	hearts	-	He	therefore	sent	
down	peace	upon	them,	and	rewarded	
them	with	an	imminent	victory.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		Allah	rāzi	huwa	imān	waloñ		se	
jab	woh	us	ped	ke	neeche	tumhāri	bai'at	
karte	they	to	Allah	ne	jāna	jo	unke	diloñ		
meiñ	hai	to	un	par	itminān	utāra	aur	
unheiñ	jald	āane	wāli	fatah	ka	in’ām	diya

arabicText: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةًۭ يَأْخُذُونَهَا ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	plenty	of	war	booty,	to	take;	and	Allah	
is	Most	Honourable,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	bahut	si	ghanimateiñ	jinko	leiñ	aur	Allah	Ízzat-o-hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَعَدَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةًۭ تَأْخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ هَـٰذِهِۦ وَكَفَّ أَيْدِىَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنكُمْ وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَةًۭ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ صِرَٰطًۭا مُّسْتَقِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	promised	you	plenty	of	booty	
which	you	will	take,	and	has	bestowed	this	
to	you	quickly,	and	restrained	peoples’	
hands	from	you;	and	in	order	that	it	may	be	
a	sign	for	the	believers,	and	to	guide	you	on	the	Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allah	ne	tum	se	w’ada	kiya	hai	bahut	si	ghanimatoñ	ka	ke	tum	loge	to	tumheiñ	yeh	jald	‘aṭa	
farma	di	aur	logoñ	ke	hāth	tum	se	rok	diye	aur	is	liye	ke	imān	waloñ		ke	liye	nishāni	ho	aur	
tumheiñ	seedhi	rāh	dikha	de

arabicText: وَأُخْرَىٰ لَمْ تَقْدِرُوا۟ عَلَيْهَا قَدْ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText: And	one	more,	not	within	your	capacity,	is	within	Allah’s	hold;	and	Allah	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	ek	aur	jo	tumhāre	bal	(Bas)	ki	na	thi	woh	Allah	ke	qabze	meiñ	hai	aur	Allah	har	cheez	par	
Qādir	hai.

arabicText: وَلَوْ قَـٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوَلَّوُا۟ ٱلْأَدْبَـٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصِيرًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	if	the	disbelievers	were	to	fight	you,	they	will	turn	away	and	flee,	and	then	they	will	not	find	
any	supporter	nor	any	aide.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	kāfir	tum	se	ladeiñ	to	zaroor	tumhāre	muqāble	se	peeth	pher	deñge	phir	koi	himayati	
na	pāayeñge	na	madadgār.

arabicText: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِى قَدْ خَلَتْ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبْدِيلًۭا
englishTranslationText: The	tradition	of	Allah,	ongoing	since	before;	and	you	will	not	find	the	tradition	of	Allah	changing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ka	dastoor	hai	ke	pehle	se	chala	āata	
hai	aur	hargiz	tum	Allah	ka	dastoor	badalta	
na	pāoge

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَّ أَيْدِيَهُمْ عَنكُمْ وَأَيْدِيَكُمْ عَنْهُم بِبَطْنِ مَكَّةَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ أَنْ أَظْفَرَكُمْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	restrained	their	hands	
from	you,	and	your	hands	from	them	in	the	
valley	of	Mecca,	after	having	given	you	
control	over	them;	and	Allah	sees	all	what	
you	do.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi	hai	jis	ne	unke	hāth	tum	se	rok	
diye	aur	tumhāre	hāth	un	se	rok	diye	Wādi
e-Makkah	meiñ	b’ad	iske	ke	tumheiñ	un	
par	qābu	de	diya	tha	aur	Allah	tumhāre	
kām	dekhta	hai

arabicText: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَصَدُّوكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ وَٱلْهَدْىَ مَعْكُوفًا أَن يَبْلُغَ مَحِلَّهُۥ ۚ وَلَوْلَا رِجَالٌۭ مُّؤْمِنُونَ وَنِسَآءٌۭ مُّؤْمِنَـٰتٌۭ لَّمْ تَعْلَمُوهُمْ أَن تَطَـُٔوهُمْ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنْهُم مَّعَرَّةٌۢ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍۢ ۖ لِّيُدْخِلَ ٱللَّهُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۚ لَوْ تَزَيَّلُوا۟ لَعَذَّبْنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
englishTranslationText:
It	was	these	who	disbelieved	and	
prevented	you	from	the	Sacred	Masjid,	and	
stopped	the	sacrificial	animals	from	
reaching	their	place;	and	were	it	not	for	
some	Muslim	men	and	Muslim	women,	
whom	you	do	not	know	-	lest	you	may	
crush	them	and	unintentionally	incur	
some	violation	due	to	them	-	Allah	would	
have	permitted	you	to	slay	them;	this	relief	
for	them,	is	so	that	Allah	may	admit	into	
His	mercy	whomever	He	wills;	and	had	
they	been	separated,	We	would	have	
indeed	punished	the	disbelievers	among	
them	with	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	woh	haiñ	jinhoñ	ne	kufr	kiya	aur	
tumheiñ	Masjid-e-Harām	se	roka	aur	
qurbāni	ke	jānwar	ruke	pade	apni	jagah	
pahuñch	ne	se	aur	agar	yeh	na	hota	kuchh	
Musalman	mard	aur	kuchh	Musalman	
aurteiñ	jinki	tumheiñ		khabar	nahi	kahiñ	
tum	unheiñ	raund	dālo	to	tumheiñ		unki	
taraf	se	anjāni	meiñ	koi	makrooh	(Na	
pasandeedah	shai)	pahuñche	to	hum	
tumheiñ		unki	qitāl	ki	ijazat	dete	unka	yeh	
bachāo	is	liye	hai	ke	Allah	apni	raḥmat	
meiñ	dākhil	kare	jise	chāhe	agar	woh	juda	
ho	jāte	to	hum	zaroor	un	meiñ	ke	kāfiroñ		
ko	dard-nāk	áƶāb		dete

arabicText: إِذْ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلْجَـٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَأَلْزَمَهُمْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓا۟ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهْلَهَا ۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Whereas	the	disbelievers	had	set	up	in	
their	hearts	an	obstinacy	-	the	same	
obstinacy	of	the	days	of	ignorance	-	so	
Allah	sent	down	His	solace	upon	His	Noble	
Messenger	and	upon	the	believers,	and	
decreed	upon	them	the	words	of	piety,	and	
they	were	more	deserving	and	suitable	for	
it;	and	Allah	is	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jabke	kāfiroñ		ne	apne	diloñ		meiñ	ad	(Zid)	
rakhi	wohi	Zamāna-e-Jahiliyat	ki	ad	to	
Allah	ne	apna	itminān	apne	Rasool	aur	
Imān	waloñ		par	utāra	aur	parhez-gāri	ka	kalima	un	par	lāzim	farmāya	aur	woh	iske	ziyada	saza
wār	aur	iske	ahel	they	aur	Allah	sab	kuchh	jānta	hai

arabicText: لَّقَدْ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءْيَا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۖ لَتَدْخُلُنَّ ٱلْمَسْجِدَ ٱلْحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمْ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمْ تَعْلَمُوا۟ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتْحًۭا قَرِيبًا
englishTranslationText:
Allah	has	indeed	made	the	truthful	dream	
of	His	Noble	Messenger,	come	true;	indeed	
you	will	all	enter	the	Sacred	Masjid,	if	Allah	wills,	in	safety	-	with	your	heads	shaven	or	hair	cut	
short	-	without	fear;	so	He	knows	what	you	do	not	know,	and	has	therefore	ordained	another	
imminent	victory	before	this.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		Allah	ne	sach	kar	diya	apne	Rasool	ka	sachcha	khwāb	be-shak		tum	zaroor	masjid-e
harām	meiñ	dākhil	hoge	agar	Allah	chāhe	amn-o-amān	se	apne	saroñ	ke	bāl	mundāte	ya	
tarashwāte	be-khauf	to	us	ne	jāna	jo	tumheiñ		m’aloom	nahi	to	is	se	pehle	ek	nazdeek	āane	wāli	
fatah	rakhi

arabicText: هُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦ ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدًۭا
englishTranslationText:
It	is	He	Who	has	sent	His	Noble	Messenger	with	the	guidance	and	the	true	religion,	in	order	to	
make	it	prevail	over	all	other	religions;	and	Allah	is	sufficient	as	a	Witness.	(The	Holy	Prophet	is	
a	light	from	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi	hai	jis	ne	apne	Rasool	ko	hidayat	aur	sachche	deen	ke	sāth	bheja	ke	usey	sab	deenoñ	par	
ghalib	kare	aur	Allah	kāfi	hai	gawah

arabicText: مُّحَمَّدٌۭ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِ ۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلْكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ تَرَىٰهُمْ رُكَّعًۭا سُجَّدًۭا يَبْتَغُونَ فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضْوَٰنًۭا ۖ سِيمَاهُمْ فِى وُجُوهِهِم مِّنْ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ ۚ وَمَثَلُهُمْ فِى ٱلْإِنجِيلِ كَزَرْعٍ أَخْرَجَ شَطْـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسْتَغْلَظَ فَٱسْتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعْجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلْكُفَّارَ ۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ مِنْهُم مَّغْفِرَةًۭ وَأَجْرًا عَظِيمًۢا
englishTranslationText:
Muhammad	(peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	is	the	Noble	Messenger	of	Allah;	and	
his	companions	are	stern	with	the	
disbelievers	and	merciful	among	
themselves	-	you	will	see	them	bowing	and	
falling	in	prostration,	seeking	Allah’s	
munificence	and	His	pleasure;	their	signs	
are	on	their	faces,	from	the	effects	of	
prostrations;	this	trait	of	theirs	is	
mentioned	in	the	Taurat;	and	their	trait	is	
mentioned	in	the	Injeel;	like	a	cultivation	
that	sprouted	its	shoot,	then	strengthened	
it,	then	thickened	and	then	stood	firm	
upon	its	stem,	pleasing	the	farmer	-	in	
order	to	enrage	the	disbelievers	with	
them;	Allah	has	promised	forgiveness	and	
a	great	reward	to	those	among	them	who	
have	faith	and	do	good	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Muhammad	Allah	ke	Rasool	haiñ	aur	unke	
sāth	wāle	kāfiroñ	par	sakht	haiñ	aur	āapas		
meiñ	naram	dil	tu	unheiñ	dekhe	ga	ruku’	
karte	sajde	meiñ	girte	Allah	ka	fazl-o-raza	
chāhte	unki	alāmat	unke	chehroñ	meiñ	hai	
sajdoñ	ke	nishān	se	yeh	unki	sifat	Taurāit	
meiñ	hai	aur	unki	sifat	Injeel	meiñ	jaise	ek	
kheti	us	ne	apna	pattha	nikāla	phir	usey	
tāqat	di	phir	dabeez	huyi	phir	apni	sāq	par	
seedhi	khadi	huyi	kisanoñ	ko	bhali	lagti	hai	
tāke	un	se	kāfiroñ	ke	dil	jaleiñ	Allah	ne	
w’ada	kiya	un	se	jo	un	meiñ	Imān	aur	
achchhe	kāmoñ	wāle	haiñ	bakhshish	aur	
bade	sawāb	ka.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تُقَدِّمُوا۟ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ۖ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	advance	
ahead	of	Allah	and	His	Noble	Messenger,	
and	fear	Allah;	indeed	Allah	is	All	Hearing,	
All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Allah	aur	uske	Rasool	se	
āage	na	badho	aur	Allah	se	daro	be-shak		
Allah	sunta	jānta	hai.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَرْفَعُوٓا۟ أَصْوَٰتَكُمْ فَوْقَ صَوْتِ ٱلنَّبِىِّ وَلَا تَجْهَرُوا۟ لَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ كَجَهْرِ بَعْضِكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ أَن تَحْبَطَ أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Do	not	raise	your	
voices	higher	than	the	voice	of	the	Prophet,	
nor	speak	to	him	loudly	the	way	you	shout	
to	one	another,	lest	your	deeds	go	to	waste	
whilst	you	are	unaware.	(Faith	will	go	waste	due	to	the	slightest	disrespect	towards	the	Holy	
Prophet	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him.	To	honour	him	is	part	of	faith.	To	disrespect	him	is	
blasphemy.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	apni	āawāzeiñ	ooñchi	na	
karo	us	ghaib	batāne	wāle	(Nabi)	ki	āawaz	
se	aur	unke	huzoor	bāt	chilla	kar	na	kaho	
jaise	āapas	meiñ	ek	doosre	ke	sāmne	
chillāte	ho	ke	kahiñ	tumhāre	‘amal	akārat	
(Zaye)	na	ho	jāyeñ	aur	tumheiñ		khabar	na	
ho

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصْوَٰتَهُمْ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمْتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ لِلتَّقْوَىٰ ۚ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌۭ وَأَجْرٌ عَظِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	suppress	their	voices	in	the	presence	of	Allah’s	Noble	Messenger,	are	the	ones	
whose	hearts	Allah	has	tested	for	piety;	for	them	is	forgiveness,	and	a	great	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		woh	jo	apni	āawāzeiñ	past	karte	haiñ	Rasoolullah	ke	pās	woh	haiñ	jinka	dil	Allah	ne	
parhez	gāri	ke	liye	parakh	liya	hai	unke	liye	bakhshish	aur	bada	sawāb	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلْحُجُرَٰتِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	most	of	those	who	call	you	from	outside	the	chambers	do	not	have	sense.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	woh	jo	tumheiñ	hujroñ	ke	bāhar	se	pukārte	haiñ	un	meiñ	aksar	be-áql	haiñ.

arabicText: وَلَوْ أَنَّهُمْ صَبَرُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ تَخْرُجَ إِلَيْهِمْ لَكَانَ خَيْرًۭا لَّهُمْ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	they	been	patient	until	you	
yourself	came	out	to	them,	it	would	be	
better	for	them;	and	Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	
Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	woh	sabr	karte	yahāñ		tak	ke	tum	
āap		unke	pās	tashreef		lāte	to	yeh	unke	liye	
behtar	tha	aur	Allah	bakhshne	wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِن جَآءَكُمْ فَاسِقٌۢ بِنَبَإٍۢ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓا۟ أَن تُصِيبُوا۟ قَوْمًۢا بِجَهَـٰلَةٍۢ فَتُصْبِحُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلْتُمْ نَـٰدِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	If	any	miscreant	
brings	you	some	tidings,	verify	it,	lest	you	
unknowingly	cause	suffering	to	some	
people,	and	then	remain	repenting	for	
what	you	did.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Agar	koi	fāsiq	tumhāre	pās	
koi	khabar	lāye	to	tehqeeq	karlo	ke	kahiñ	
kisi	qaum	ko	be-jāne	izā	na	de	baitho	phir	
apne	kiye	par	pachtāte	reh	jāo.

arabicText: وَٱعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ فِيكُمْ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ لَوْ يُطِيعُكُمْ فِى كَثِيرٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلْأَمْرِ لَعَنِتُّمْ وَلَـٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيْكُمُ ٱلْكُفْرَ وَٱلْفُسُوقَ وَٱلْعِصْيَانَ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّٰشِدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	know	that	Allah’s	Noble	Messenger	is	
among	you;	in	most	of	the	affairs,	were	he	
to	listen	to	you,	you	would	surely	fall	into	
hardship,	but	Allah	has	made	faith	dear	to	
you	and	has	instilled	it	in	your	hearts,	and	
has	made	disbelief	and	rebellion	and	
disobedience	abhorred	by	you;	it	is	people	
like	these	who	are	on	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jān	lo	ke	tum	meiñ	Allah	ke	Rasool	haiñ	
bahut	mu'āmloñ	meiñ	agar	yeh	tumhāri	
khushi	kareiñ	to	tum	zaroor	mashaqqat	
meiñ	pado	lekin	Allah	ne	tumheiñ	Imān	
piyara	kar	diya	hai	aur	usey	tumhāre	diloñ		
meiñ	āarāsta	kar	diya	aur	kufr	aur	ḥukm		
udooli	aur	na-farmāni	tumheiñ	na-gawār	
kardi	aise	hi	log	rāh	par	haiñ

arabicText: فَضْلًۭا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعْمَةًۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
The	munificence	and	favour	of	Allah;	and	
Allah	is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	ka	fazl	aur	ehsān	aur	Allah	‘Ilm-o
Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ٱقْتَتَلُوا۟ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتْ إِحْدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلْأُخْرَىٰ فَقَـٰتِلُوا۟ ٱلَّتِى تَبْغِى حَتَّىٰ تَفِىٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمْرِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن فَآءَتْ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَهُمَا بِٱلْعَدْلِ وَأَقْسِطُوٓا۟ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُقْسِطِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	if	two	groups	of	Muslims	fight	against	
each	other,	reconcile	them;	and	if	one	of	
them	oppresses	the	other,	fight	against	the	
oppressor	till	it	returns	to	the	command	of	
Allah;	then	if	it	returns,	reconcile	between	
them	with	justice,	and	be	fair;	indeed	Allah	
loves	the	equitable.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Musalmanoñ	ke	do	giroh	āapas		
meiñ	ladeiñ	to	un	meiñ	sulah	karāo	phir	
agar	ek	doosre	par	ziyadati	kare	to	us	
ziyadati	wāle	se	lado	yahāñ	tak	ke	woh	
Allah	ke	ḥukm		ki	taraf	palat	āaye	phir	agar	
palat	āaye	to	insāf	ke	sāth	un	meiñ	islāh	
kardo	aur	‘adl	karo	be-shak	‘adl	wāle	Allah	
ko	piyare	haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ إِخْوَةٌۭ فَأَصْلِحُوا۟ بَيْنَ أَخَوَيْكُمْ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	Muslims	are	brothers	to	each	other,	
therefore	make	peace	between	your	two	
brothers	and	fear	Allah,	so	that	you	may	
gain	mercy.	(The entire Muslim nation is a 
single brotherhood, without any distinction for caste, creed or colour.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Musalman	Musalman	bhai	haiñ	to	apne	do	bhaiyoñ	meiñ	sulah	karo	aur	Allah	se	daro	ke	tum	par	
Raḥmat	ho

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا يَسْخَرْ قَوْمٌۭ مِّن قَوْمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُوا۟ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا نِسَآءٌۭ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيْرًۭا مِّنْهُنَّ ۖ وَلَا تَلْمِزُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ وَلَا تَنَابَزُوا۟ بِٱلْأَلْقَـٰبِ ۖ بِئْسَ ٱلِٱسْمُ ٱلْفُسُوقُ بَعْدَ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنِ ۚ وَمَن لَّمْ يَتُبْ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Men	must	not	ridicule	other	men	for	it	could	be	that	the	ridiculed	are	
better	than	the	mockers,	nor	must	the	women	ridicule	other	women	for	the	ridiculed	women	
may	be	better	than	the	mockers;	and	do	not	insult	one	another,	nor	assign	evil	nicknames;	how	
base	it	is	to	be	called	a	sinner	after	being	a	Muslim!	And	whoever	does	not	repent	-	then	it	is	they	
who	are	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	na	mard	mardoñ	se	hañse	ajab	nahi	ke	woh	un	hañsne	waloñ		se	behtar	hoñ	aur	
na	aurteiñ	aurtoñ	se,	door	nahi	ke	woh	un	hañsne	wāliyoñ	se	behtar	hoñ	aur	āapas		meiñ	t’anā	
na	karo	aur	ek	doosre	ke	bure	nām	na	rakho	kya	hi	bura	nām	hai	Musalman	hokar	fāsiq	kehlāna	
aur	jo	tauba	na	kareiñ	to	wohi	Ƶālim	haiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ كَثِيرًۭا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعْضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثْمٌۭ ۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُوا۟ وَلَا يَغْتَب بَّعْضُكُم بَعْضًا ۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمْ أَن يَأْكُلَ لَحْمَ أَخِيهِ مَيْتًۭا فَكَرِهْتُمُوهُ ۚ وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
O	People	who	Believe!	Avoid	excessive	
assumptions;	indeed	assumption	sometimes	
becomes	a	sin,	and	do	not	seek	faults,	and	do	
not	slander	one	another;	would	any	one	
among	you	like	to	eat	the	flesh	of	his	dead	
brother?	So	you	will	hate	that!	And	fear	
Allah;	indeed	Allah	is	Most	Acceptor	of	
Repentance,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Imān	wālo	Bahut	gumānoñ	se	bacho	be
shak		koi	gumān	gunah	ho	jāta	hai	aur	‘aib	na	
dhooñdo	aur	ek	doosre	ki	gheebat	na	karo	
kya	tum	meiñ	koi	pasand	rakhe	ga	ke	apne	
mare	bhai	ka	gosht	khāye	to	yeh	tumheiñ		
gawāra	na	hoga	aur	Allah	se	daro	be-shak		
Allah	bahut	tauba	qabool	karne	wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٍۢ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلْنَـٰكُمْ شُعُوبًۭا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓا۟ ۚ إِنَّ أَكْرَمَكُمْ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتْقَىٰكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٌۭ ١٣
englishTranslationText:
O	mankind!	We	have	indeed	created	you	
from	one	man	and	one	woman,	and	have	
made	you	into	various	nations	and	tribes	so	
that	you	may	know	one	another;	indeed	the	
more	honourable	among	you,	in	the	sight	of	
Allah,	is	one	who	is	more	pious	among	you;	
indeed	Allah	is	All	Knowing,	All	Aware.	
(Piety	is	the	basis	of	honour	in	Allah’s	sight.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	logoñ!	Hum	ne	tumheiñ	ek	mard	aur	ek	
aurat	se	paida	kiya	aur	tumheiñ	shākheiñ	
aur	qabeele	kiya	ke	āapas	meiñ	pehchān	
rakho	be-shak	Allah	ke	yahāñ	tum	meiñ	
ziyada	Ízzat	wāla	woh	jo	tum	meiñ	ziyada	
parhez-gār	hai	be-shak	Allah	jānne	wāla	
khabar-dār	hai

arabicText: ۞ قَالَتِ ٱلْأَعْرَابُ ءَامَنَّا ۖ قُل لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ وَلَـٰكِن قُولُوٓا۟ أَسْلَمْنَا وَلَمَّا يَدْخُلِ ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ فِى قُلُوبِكُمْ ۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتْكُم مِّنْ أَعْمَـٰلِكُمْ شَيْـًٔا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ ١٤
englishTranslationText:
The	ignorant	said,	“We	have	accepted	faith”;	
say,	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him),	“You	have	surely	not	
accepted	faith,	but	you	should	say	‘We	have	
submitted’,	for	faith	has	not	yet	entered	your	
hearts;	and	if	you	obey	*	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger,	He	will	not	reduce	the	reward	of	
any	of	your	deeds;	indeed	Allah	is	Oft	
Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.”	(* By accepting 
faith and then obeying the commands).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Gañwār	bole	hum	Imān	lāye	tum	farmāo		
tum	Imān	to	na	lāye	hāñ	yooñ	kaho	ke	hum	
mutee'	huwe	aur	abhi	imān	tumhāre	diloñ		
meiñ	kahāñ	dākhil	huwa	aur	agar	tum	Allah	
aur	uske	Rasool	ki	farmāñ	bardāri	karoge	to	
tumhāre	kisi	‘amal	ka	tumheiñ	nuqsān	na	
dega	be-shak	Allah	bakhshne	wāla	
maherbān	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَرْتَابُوا۟ وَجَـٰهَدُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِهِمْ وَأَنفُسِهِمْ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
The	true	believers	are	only	those	who	
accepted	faith	in	Allah	and	His	Noble	
Messenger	and	then	did	not	have	any	doubt,	
and	fought	with	their	wealth	and	their	lives	in	
Allah’s	way;	it	is	they	who	are	the	truthful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Imān	wāle	to	wohi	haiñ	jo	Allah	aur	uske	
Rasool	par	Imān	lāye	phir	shak	na	kiya	aur	
apni	jān	aur	māl	se	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	jihād	
kiya	wohi	sachche	haiñ

arabicText: قُلْ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمْ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“Are	you	teaching	Allah	
your	own	religion?	Whereas	Allah	knows	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	the	
earth;	and	Allah	knows	all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmāo	kya	tum	Allah	ko	apna	deen	batāte	ho	aur	Allah	jānta	hai	jo	kuchh	āasmānoñ	meiñ	
aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	meiñ	hai	aur	Allah	sab	kuchh	jānta	hai

arabicText: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيْكَ أَنْ أَسْلَمُوا۟ ۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّوا۟ عَلَىَّ إِسْلَـٰمَكُم ۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيْكُمْ أَنْ هَدَىٰكُمْ لِلْإِيمَـٰنِ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	portray	that	they	are	doing	a	great	favour	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	
blessings	be	upon	him)	by	having	become	Muslims;	say,	“Do	not	think	that	you	have	done	me	a	
favour	by	accepting	Islam;	in	fact	Allah	has	bestowed	a	favour	upon	you,	for	He	guided	you	to	
Islam,	if	you	are	truthful.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Mehboob	Woh	tum	par	ehsān	jatāte	haiñ	ke	Musalman	ho	gaye	tum	farmāo		apne	Islam	ka	
ehsān	mujh	par	na	rakho	balke	Allah	tum	par	ehsān	rakhta	hai	ke	us	ne	tumheiñ		Islam	ki	hidāyat	
ki	agar	tum	sachche	ho

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: Indeed	Allah	knows	all	the	hidden	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	and	Allah	is	seeing	your	deeds.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	Allah	jānta	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ke	sab	ghaib	aur	Allah	tumhāre	kām	dekh	rahā	hai.

arabicText: قٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ٱلْمَجِيدِ
englishTranslationText:
Qaaf*;	by	oath	of	the	Glorious	Qur’an.	
(*Alphabet of the Arabic language; Allah 
and to whomever He reveals, know their 
precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Qaaf*;	Ízzat	wāle	Qur’ān	ki	qasam.	(*Arabi 
zabān ka harf jis ke ma’āni Allah aur jis 
par Allah ne isko nazil farmaya Wahi 
jānta hai.)

arabicText: بَلْ عَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا شَىْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
englishTranslationText:
Rather	they	were	shocked	that	a	Herald	of	
Warning	came	to	them	from	among	
themselves,	so	the	disbelievers	said,	“This	
is	something	really	strange.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	unheiñ	iska	achamba	(T’ajjub)	huwa	
ke	unke	pās	unhiñ	meiñ	ka	ek	dar	sunāne	
wāla	tashreef	lāya	to	kāfir	bole	yeh	to	ájeeb	
bāt	hai

arabicText: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًۭا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌۢ بَعِيدٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
“When	we	are	dead	and	have	turned	to	
dust,	will	we	be	raised	again?	That	return	
is	impossible!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kya	jab	hum	mar	jāyeñ	aur	mitti	ho	
jāyeñge	phir	jiyeñge	yeh	palatna	door	hai

arabicText: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَـٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ
englishTranslationText:
We	know	all	what	the	earth	decreases	
from	them;	and	with	Us	is	a	Book	that	
retains.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hum	jānte	haiñ	jo	kuchh	zameen	un	meiñ	
se	ghatāti	hai	aur	hamāre	pās	ek	yād	
rakhne	wāli	Kitāb	hai

arabicText: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِىٓ أَمْرٍۢ مَّرِيجٍ
englishTranslationText:
In	fact	they	denied	the	Truth	when	it	came	
to	them,	so	they	are	now	in	a	dilemma.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Balke	unhoñ	ne	haq	ko	jhutlāya	jab	woh	
unke	pās	āaya	to	woh	ek	muztarib	be	sabāt	
bāt	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
So	did	they	not	see	the	sky	above	them	-	
how	We	have	made	it	and	beautified	it,	and	
there	are	no	cracks	in	it?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	unhoñ	ne	apne	upar	āasmān	ko	na	
dekha	hum	ne	usey	kaisa	banāya	aur	
sañwāra	aur	is	meiñ	kahiñ	rakhna	nahi
